event1.subtitle: Concert
event1.dialogue: Woah dude that was wicked! I love these guys' music
event1.desc:
Hey duuude, hear there is a 
 concert in town this cycle, wanna 
 come with??

option1.name: Sure thing, will meet you there!

option2.name: No thanks, have to catch up on work stuff, go on without me

event2.subtitle: Party
event2.dialogue: Man that was awesome. We should do this more often.
event2.desc: Hey. there is gonna be this sick party soon, you should come with

option1.name: Sure thing, will meet you there!

event3.subtitle: Pub
event3.dialogue: I needed that for sure. See you later!
event3.desc: Its that time of the cycle again, you coming to the pub?

option1.name: You bet, im on my way now

option2.name: No thanks, have to catch up on work stuff, go on without me

event4.subtitle: Grandma
event4.dialogue: It was so nice to see you my dear. Have a safe journey home.
event4.desc: I think you should go visit your gran

option1.name: Sure thing, will meet you there!

event5.subtitle: Flatmate
event5.dialogue: Nice hanging out dude. Weird how we barely do that despite living in the same place.

option1.name: Sure

event6.subtitle: Friend
event6.dialogue: That was awesome bro! We gotta do this more often.

option1.name: Sure

event7.subtitle: Cinema
event7.dialogue: Man that was awesome. We should do this more often.
event7.desc: We should go to the cinema

option1.name: Sure

event11.subtitle:
Get 
 Pet
event11.desc: So my fren has a doggo that needs a home, you want another fren?

option1.name: Sure thing, send me their details

option2.name: No thanks, I dont have the time to care for a pupper sorry :(

event12.subtitle:
Get 
 Game
event12.dialogue: This is a nice game, I love it!
event12.desc: Its time to buy a new game, which one to get?

option1.name: Demon Slayer: Infinity

event13.subtitle: Chill
event13.dialogue:
Its nice to stay at home 
sometimes
event13.desc: I think you should stay at home today

option1.name: Sounds like a plan

event14.subtitle: Clean
event14.dialogue: A clean house is a happy house!
event14.desc: I think we should clean the apartment today

option1.name: I agree, looks like a mess

option2.name: No, I should go to work

event15.subtitle:
Play 
 Games
event15.dialogue: Its great fun playing these games
event15.desc: Heard you got a new game, wanna have a few rounds in it?

option1.name: Sure

option2.name: No, I should go to work

event16.subtitle: Movie
event16.dialogue: That film rocked, cant wait for the next one!
event16.desc: Found a few films we should watch, wanna hang

option1.name: Sure, I'll put on the popcorn

option2.name: No, I should go to work

event17.subtitle: Park
event17.dialogue: Nothing like a walk in the park to clear my head
event17.desc: Its a nice day outside, lets go for a walk

option1.name: Sure, I'll meet you at the park

option2.name: No, I should go to work

event21.subtitle: Parents
event21.dialogue: Great seeing you, my boy. See you soon!
event21.desc: We are coming to town, we should a coffee

option1.name: Sure thing, come over and ill put the kettle on!

event22.Subtitle: Grandma
event22.dialogue: I do love these visits, dearie.
event22.desc: I think you should go over and visit your Grandma before she gets lonely

option1.name: Ok

event23.subtitle:
Grandma 
 Coffee
event23.dialogue: Nothing like a hot home brewed coffee.
event23.desc: Im going to make a pot of coffee, would you like a cup?

option1.name: Yes please, that sounds amazing

event24.subtitle:
Grandma 
 Party
event24.desc: Im having a party with my friends as they are retireing, wanna show up?

option1.name: Sounds like an epic party, I'll be there

event25.subtitle:
Walk 
 Dog
event25.desc: Woof WoofWoof WoofWoof WoofWoof WoofWoof WoofWoof WoofWoof Woof

option1.name: I think it may be time to walk the doggo

event26.subtitle:
Pet 
 Care
event26.desc: Pupper looks like he wants attention, I think i should spend some time with them

option1.name: Puppy time it is

event27.subtitle:
Train 
 Pet
event27.dialogue: I wonder if I can train him to train himself
event27.desc: The pupper is looking at me with affectioness intent, maybe I should train them

option1.name: Grab the treat bag and train the doggo to be the best pupper they can be

option2.name: Give the puppy a belly rub

event31.subtitle:
Work 
 Party
event31.dialogue: These things never quite live up to my expectations
event31.desc: We are having a party at work, wanna come?

option1.name: Sure thing, ill grab some snacks on my way over!

event32.subtitle: Overtime
event32.dialogue: Thanks for your help, partner. I've given you a small bonus.
event32.desc: Our work project was planned badly, we need some help to avoid overtime

option1.name: Damn, Ill help out!

event33.subtitle: Payday
event33.dialogue: I swear they keep leaving out a zero on these payslips.
event33.desc: Its that time of the cycle again, drinks at the office?

option1.name: Sounds like a blast, I'll get some supllies

option2.name: Its a night in for me

event34.subtitle:
Work 
 Hard
event34.dialogue: You've been doing very well. Keep it up!
event34.desc: Boss is looking down at me for not being here all the time

option1.name: I think I need to step up my presence at work

option2.name: I think he is just having a bad day, I'll be ok

event35.subtitle:
Get 
 Job
event35.dialogue: I'll give you one more chance.
event35.desc:
You are being fired for poor performance, you should have gone to work more. 
 This takes effect from the start of the next cycle.

option1.name: Give me another chance please!

event36.subtitle: Promotion
event36.desc: Your performance is beyond stellar, heres a promotion

option1.name: Ill take this in stride

option2.name: I rather stay where I am at the moment, I like it here

event37.subtitle: Work
event37.dialogue: See you next shift, I guess
event37.desc: I think I should go to work this cycle

option1.name: Sounds like a plan
